message:
Register, and let's arrange together so we can meet there and maybe discuss the next step that we should do in order to take EgyptianGeeks group activities to the next level.

anyone who will register, please share your interest, and just before the event, we will see how we can meet there.
waiting to see you all ISA. :)
--
story: Mohammed El Sayed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Visual Studio 2012 Launch
caption: msevents.microsoft.com
description: You can register for this event using your Windows Live ID. If you don't already have a Windows Live ID, click the Sign up button to create one.
